title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 145 - Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 145 - Appeals

State Regulations
§ 145.1 - Purpose and general description
§ 145.2 - Appeal procedures concerning denials to certify a business enterprise as a minority or women-owned business enterprise or notification of intent to revoke certification
§ 145.3 - Appeal procedures concerning contractor and State agency complaints

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. XIV, pt. 145

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§ 313[2], [2-a], 313-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
